item.title: The Gatekeeper Before Your Git Commits: Pre-commit
item.description:
Make your Git commits safer! No complex setup required. Just install and commit with confidence.
Use pre-commit to automatically run format checks and tests before committing.
Easy to install and configure. Instantly improve your code quality.

item.title: [Git Tutorial] Configuring Global gitignore Locally
item.description:
Do you include automatically generated editor configuration files in your .gitignore while developing a project?
Why add your personal environment settings to the project?
